title: How come Riot hasn't given me he snow day scuttler icon yet?
body: I gifted a friend in Snowdown because I wanted the snow day scuttler icon because it was a legacy icon. However, it still hasn't come and Snowdown ended. Does anyone know why I still haven't gotten the icon yet?

replies.body: Snowdown icons are not finished being sent out.  We aim to have distribution completed by the 23rd along with the poro king and others.  Hang on until then!
